review: Dr. Reddy generic does NOT work.Torrent brand does. Why is CVS changing brands?How many people can't  breathe & don't  know why. This brand should be pulled stat!
I have really bad asthma and nothing seemed to help.  I recently started taking Singulair and my asthma has improved unbelievably.  No more wheezing and severe headaches.  I feel like a new person.
Very expensive (even with insurance) but it really works for my grandson so we make the sacrifice.
